Posts.Content: Dec 8, 2013 05:54PM ladydi950 wrote: hi I also am newly diagnosed and was expecting the biopsy result to be positive even tho there was a small chance of the radiologist being wrong. I have a dr appt on Wednesday to discuss the treaent options. So many things to think about and I am worried about all the medical bills and how I will handle work they all of this. I diagnosed with IDC but that is all I know. From what I am reading it is a rough ride but a lot depends on type of cancer.
Posts.Title: Invasive Ductal Carcinoma - age 36.... oh crap!! Tam178 AndreaJ50
